data.title: Rupert Murdoch & family
data.meta_description: #100 Rupert Murdoch & family on the 2024 Billionaires - Rupert Murdoch built a media empire that includes cable channel Fox News, The Times of London and
data.text:
Billionaire Gautam Adani’s Fortune Slips Again After Hindenburg Report Targets Indian Regulator

On Saturday, Hindenburg Research published a report alleging a conflict of interest by the head of India’s market regulatory body and claimed this prevented a proper investigation into Adani.

FC Barcelona Joan Gamper Trophy Line Up Versus AS Monaco

FC Barcelona will host AS Monaco at the Montjuic Stadium on Monday for the Joan Gamper Trophy match which typically gets its season underway.

‘Twisters’ Debuts On Digital Streaming This Week

"Twisters"—Glen Powell and Daisy Edgar-Jones’ hit disaster thriller—is debuting this week on digital streaming. Find out when and where you can see it at home.

New Technology Could Bring More Transparency To Broadway Seating

Preevue, a leading provider of technology allowing theatergoers to get sneak peeks of the views from their seats, could soon become available at more Broadway theaters.

Memes And Durags: Navigating Authenticity In Olympic Breaking

While Olympics breakers' big personalities and flashy moves garnered plenty of cheers, it was the more questionable moments that received the internet’s attention.

What’s Ahead For Tari Eason In 2024-2025?

Tari Eason might have been Houston's most impactful player the past two seasons. Can he stay healthy next year?

When Do New ‘Industry’ Season 3 Episodes Drop? See The Release Schedule

Your favorite finance series is back. HBO's "Industry" officially returned for its third season, but when do new episodes come out? See the full release schedule for Season 3.

Olympic Pistol Medalist Kim Ye-Ji Who Went Viral Suddenly Collapses

South Korea’s Kim Ye-ji, who went viral on social media during her silver medal performance in the 10m air pistol at the Olympics, passed out at a press conference.

Lewis Howes On Sharpening The Athlete Mindset At VeeCon 2024

Lewis Howes shares his journey from Arena Football to business in this exclusive interview at VeeCon 2024, emphasizing the importance of mindset in achieving greatness.

Woman’s Corporate Experience Helps Family Wines Reach Greater Goals

A woman with a successful corporate career takes another leap in life to help establish her family's winery in Argentina while bringing new life to their Bordeaux estates.

Why Do So Many Family Offices Use Excel?

Microsoft Excel is a mainstay for many family offices around the world - a consequence of an opaque industry and a lack of industry benchmarks for digital tools.

Trump’s Family Separation Immigration Policy: How History Could Repeat

Donald Trump’s defense of family separation indicates the immigration policy could return if he wins the election in November 2024.

‘Astro Bot’ Ups The Challenge But Stays Approachable For Families

Father-daughter hands-on with the game to see how well it works for families. Interview with studio head, Nicolas Doucet, highlights some novel accessibility features.

Succession: The Brewing Controversy Over The Murdoch Family Trust

The Murdoch case highlights the challenges of balancing business continuity, family harmony, and individual aspirations in high-stakes succession planning.
